title: I Broke League(Predator Kayn)

embed.description: IamSamsquanch / Bronze 2 0LP / 12W 9L Win Ratio 57% / Tahm Kench - 24W 19L Win Ratio 56%, Taric - 9W 5L Win Ratio 64%, Anivia - 3W 6L Win Ratio 33%, Nunu - 4W 4L Win Ratio 50%, Fizz - 4W 4L Win Ratio 50%

body: So I didn't check to see if the Predator bug was fixed when I rolled Kayn in ARAM. As i load in the game, it didn't switch me to Electrocute. I had Predator. It was buggy the whole game. I couldn't buy a completed item until I could change forms.

replies.body: Weeeeeeiiiiiird.....so it looks like that is still a known bug from it still being on the status page, and that rune should have been switched with Electrocute like you mentioned. Sorry that happened, but I'm definitely going to try to make sure this gets forwarded to the right people. Please post this over in Report a Bug as well where the Devs will actually see it!
